text:
"FNaF World" is an indie role-playing video game created by Scott Cawthon. It is the first official spin-off to the "Five Nights at Freddy's" series.
The game was released for Microsoft Windows on January 21, 2016. On February 8, 2016, the game was updated, and re-released as freeware on Game Jolt free of charge. It received mixed reviews. Metacritic gave the game a review of 4.6/10.
